title: Bring your pet home to The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments! We accept pets!
posting_body: ['The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments', 'Featured Floorplan: 1-bed / 1-bath / 736 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1810', 'Deposit: Call', 'show contact info', 'Description: Inside your apartment, you will enjoy high-quality features like gas fireplaces, 9-foot ceilings, walk-in closets, an attached balcony/patio, and plenty of storage space.', 'Many of our apartments even include an in-home washer and dryer!', 'Also, our community is pet-friendly with a limit of 2 pets per apartment.', 'Visit our amenities page to see what you can look forward to when you make the move to The Bluffs at Castle Rock.', 'Lease Terms: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'Pet Policy: The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', '$30/pet, pet rent per month.', '$300 non-refundable pet fee; $300 pet deposit per pet will be collected.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Air Conditioning/Heating', '● Cable Ready', '● Carpet', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dining Room', '● Disposal', '● Kitchen', '● Range', '● Refrigerator', '● Tub/Shower', '● Accent Color Walls', '● Double Pane Windows', '● Gas Fireplaces on Top Floors', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● Newly Renovated', '● Private Entrances', '● Spacious Floor Plans', '● Stainless Steel Appliances', 'In Select Homes', '● Vaulted Ceilings on Top Floors', '● Vinyl Flooring', 'Community Features:', '● BBQ and Picnic Area', '● Coffee Bar', '● Fitness Center', '● Laundry Facilities', '● Lounge', '● Maintenance on site', '● Package Service', '● Resident Business Center', '● Smoke Free', '● Sprinkler System', '● 5 minutes from Target, Home Depot and The Castle Rock Factory Outlets', '● Bark Park and Dog Run Area', '● Easy Access to I-25', '● Game Room with Shuffleboard', '● Next to Castle Rock Community Center', '● On-Site Management and Maintenance', '● Outdoor Lounge with Fire Pit', '● Short-term Lease Available', '● Sparkling Pool/Spa', '● State-Of-The-Art Fitness Center', 'Call us:', 'show contact info', '483 Scott Blvd', 'Castle Rock, CO 80104', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '158BD6C5A7EB4B4']
